Clock from center moving from 12:00-12:00

Examples:
At t=0:   0518,0518-0518,0000 12:00
At t=45:  0518,0518-1036,0000 01:30
At t=90:  0518,0518-1036,0518 03:00
At t=135: 0518,0518-1036,1036 04:30
At t=180: 0518,0518-0518,1036 06:00
At t=225: 0518,0518-0000,1036 07:30
At t=270: 0518,0518-0000,0518 09:00
At t=315: 0518,0518-0000,0000 10:30
At t=360: 0518,0518-0518,0000 12:00

Time:
t=atan(x2-x1,y1-y2)
t=atan(x-518,518-y)
(Add 360 if < 0)
